DOC.brief_title: EMS Use Isopropyl Alcohol Aromatherapy Versus Ondansetron

PROCEDURES AND LOGISTICS All Advanced Life Support Ambulances San Antonio Fire Department seal numbered opaque box envelop either : - Three large 2 ply 70 % Isopropyl Alcohol swab OR - Ondansetron ( Zofran ) 4mg IV/IM use These study packet similar weight , shape contour despite content .
